# Check Dates
```{r}

```

# Check lat/lon
```{r}
all(df_pesp$Latitude >= -90 & df_pesp$Latitude <= 90 | is.na(df_pesp$Latitude)) &
all(df_pesp$Longitude >= -180 & df_pesp$Longitude <= 180 | is.na(df_pesp$Longitude))
```
